category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TWP.StationAttribute
preference.preference_description: Defines the text that is displayed as the footer of a station in the Time Way Planner view of the Manufacturing Process Planner application. Valid Values: legend - Any string that is displayed as it is entered. property-name - The internal name of the property on the process line. The property-name string is replaced by the property display name, for example, the value Name: [bl_rev_object_name] is displayed as Name: Object Name.

context.name: Teamcenter
context.value: Name:[bl_rev_object_name]/ Takt Time:[Mfg0cycle_time]/ Capacity:[Mfg0capacity]/ Allocated Time:[Mfg0allocated_time]
